title: How to Populate structure fields from c charecter string?
body:
I have c-string "123N1N12N125N12AA1234125N12AA1234" in which fields of different data structures are stroed one after another. for ex.

struct1 (fixed size 9 bytes)
{
char struct_name[4];
char field1[2];
char field2[3];
}  // "123N1N12N"

struct2 (fixed size 13 bytes)
{
char struct_name[4];
char num_field1[3];
char num_field2[2];
char num_field3[4];
} //"124N111223333"

struct3
{
char struct_name[4];
char struct_size[2];
char field1[2];
char field2; //size will be struct size - fixed size (10)
} //"125N12AA1234"

let's say there are n structures and the order is not fixed, based on the struct name I have to determine the number of bytes to read and populate individual struct fields.

Could you please suggest how to read and populate individual structures from c string?
